newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Forint ends a shade easier vs dlr in slow market.
newsitem.headline: Forint ends a shade easier vs dlr in slow market.

text.p: Hungary's forint closed slightly weaker against the dollar on Thursday in a very slow market with holidays throughout continental Europe, traders said.
The forint closed at 181.54/59 against the dollar, compared with 181.50 at midday and 181.42/47 in early trading.
The Hungarian unit traded right on the National Bank of Hungary's resistance level throughout the day.
The forint floats against a currency basket made up 30 percent of the dollar and 70 percent of the mark.
